# blade prepare

Prepare to experiment

## Synopsis

Prepare to experiment, for example, attach agent to java process or deploy agent to kubernetes cluster.

```text
blade prepare
```

## Examples

```text
prepare jvm --process tomcat
```

## Options

```text
  -h, --help   help for prepare
```

